element.name: TMainBar.FormCreate
element.descr: A DockMaster is created, OnSave and OnRestore handlers are added to it, and an elastic docksite is added to the main form.

element.name: TMainBar
element.short: This sample application main form demonstrates the instrumentation of an application for persistent docked layouts.

descr.p: This handler serves two purposes: it creates multiple instances of (dummy) forms of the same class type, and reopens the files stored in a notebook.
For all TViewWindows a special descriptor string is created, that is recognized and handled in the OnRestore handler.
EditBooks do their own streaming of the open files, here their SaveToStream method is called with a StringStream.
